body_html: I will take a look but it will take me a few days to get to it. The reason it isn't trivial to put it in the timelines is that deallocation is done when the refcount falls to zero, not by an explicit call at a site that has a reference to the timeline datastructure.
body_text: I will take a look but it will take me a few days to get to it. The reason it isn't trivial to put it in the timelines is that deallocation is done when the refcount falls to zero, not by an explicit call at a site that has a reference to the timeline datastructure.
body: I will take a look but it will take me a few days to get to it. The reason it isn't trivial to put it in the timelines is that deallocation is done when the refcount falls to zero, not by an explicit call at a site that has a reference to the timeline datastructure.
